official_title: Investigation of a Cooling Vest in Men With Chemotherapy-Induced Hot Flashes
inclusion_criteria:
* Males, who are at least 18 years old.
* Self-reports having at least two (2) daily hot flashes associated with prostate cancer chemotherapy-induced hot flashes and night sweats.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Has another existing medical condition that would prevent study compliance.
